headline: NRG Energy, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, January 23, 2026--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend on the Company’s common stock of $0.475 per share, or $1.90 per share on an annualized basis. This dividend represents an 8% increase from the prior year, in line with the Company’s previously announced annual dividend growth rate target of 7–9% per share. The dividend is payable on February 17, 2026, to stockholders of record as of February 2, 2026.

headline: NRG Energy Controls Both Power Generation and Distribution as AI Data Centers Reshape the Grid
summary: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) dropped 4.7% over the past week while the S&P 500 slipped just 0.5%. Year to date, NRG is down 5.1% versus the market’s 1% gain. So why does Wall Street keep betting on this utility? The answer isn’t defensive positioning. It’s infrastructure. The AI Power Supercycle Thesis NRG sits at the intersection ...
